wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Clegg (born 23 November 1995) is a British Paralympic swimmer. He won bronze in the Men's 100 metre backstroke S12 and Men’s 100 metre freestyle in 2020, in which he broke the British record with a time of 53.43. He is the brother of fellow para-swimmer James Clegg and para-athlete Libby Clegg.

response: James Clegg (born 5 January 1994) is a British Paralympic swimmer. Clegg competes in S12 events and qualified for the 2012 Summer Paralympics, winning the bronze in the men's 100 m butterfly event. He is the brother of fellow para-swimmer Stephen Clegg and para-athlete Libby Clegg.
